amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the funding for the Office of Inspector General of the Department of Commerce by $596,000 and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the funding for the Office of Inspector General of the Department of Commerce by $596,000 and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A016) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A016) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A016) offered by Mr. Broun (GA).
